articles.author: Kate Bartlett
articles.title: South Africa hosts G20 as tensions with U.S. flare amid boycott - NPR
articles.description: The U.S. boycotts South Africa's G20 summit, sparking a diplomatic spat and throwing the global gathering into turmoil.
articles.content: JOHANNESBURG, South Africa The world'sbiggest economy will be conspicuously absent from a meeting of the globe's 20 richest nations this weekend, as the U.S. boycotts the G20 Leaders' Summit hosted b… [+4963 chars]
